mapper.select: select patient_id, patient_name, in_time, patient_gender, patient_age, patient_height, patient_weight, eye_left, eye_right, body_temper, heart_beat, blood_pressure, blood_glucose, blood_fat, body_detail, patient_phone, patient_address, comment from patient_info where patient_id = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_info(patient_id, patient_name, in_time, patient_gender, patient_age, patient_height, patient_weight, eye_left, eye_right, body_temper, heart_beat, blood_pressure, blood_glucose, blood_fat, body_detail, patient_phone, patient_address, comment) values (#{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{inTime}, #{patientGender}, #{patientAge}, #{patientHeight}, #{patientWeight}, #{eyeLeft}, #{eyeRight}, #{bodyTemper}, #{heartBeat}, #{bloodPressure}, #{bloodGlucose}, #{bloodFat}, #{bodyDetail}, #{patientPhone}, #{patientaddress}, #{comment})

insert into patient_info(patient_name, in_time, patient_gender, patient_age, patient_height, patient_weight, eye_left, eye_right, body_temper, heart_beat, blood_pressure, blood_glucose, blood_fat, body_detail, patient_phone, patient_address, comment) values
(#{entity.patientName}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.patientGender}, #{entity.patientAge}, #{entity.patientHeight}, #{entity.patientWeight}, #{entity.eyeLeft}, #{entity.eyeRight}, #{entity.bodyTemper}, #{entity.heartBeat}, #{entity.bloodPressure}, #{entity.bloodGlucose}, #{entity.bloodFat}, #{entity.bodyDetail}, #{entity.patientPhone}, #{entity.patientaddress}, #{entity.comment})

insert into patient_info(patient_name, in_time, patient_gender, patient_age, patient_height, patient_weight, eye_left, eye_right, body_temper, heart_beat, blood_pressure, blood_glucose, blood_fat, body_detail, patient_phone, patient_address, comment) values
(#{entity.patientName}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.patientGender}, #{entity.patientAge}, #{entity.patientHeight}, #{entity.patientWeight}, #{entity.eyeLeft}, #{entity.eyeRight}, #{entity.bodyTemper}, #{entity.heartBeat}, #{entity.bloodPressure}, #{entity.bloodGlucose}, #{entity.bloodFat}, #{entity.bodyDetail}, #{entity.patientPhone}, #{entity.patientaddress}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update patient_name = values(patient_name), in_time = values(in_time), patient_gender = values(patient_gender), patient_age = values(patient_age), patient_height = values(patient_height), patient_weight = values(patient_weight), eye_left = values(eye_left), eye_right = values(eye_right), body_temper = values(body_temper), heart_beat = values(heart_beat), blood_pressure = values(blood_pressure), blood_glucose = values(blood_glucose), blood_fat = values(blood_fat), body_detail = values(body_detail), patient_phone = values(patient_phone), patient_address = values(patient_address), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update patient_info
patient_name = #{patientName},
in_time = #{inTime},
patient_gender = #{patientGender},
patient_age = #{patientAge},
patient_height = #{patientHeight},
patient_weight = #{patientWeight},
eye_left = #{eyeLeft},
eye_right = #{eyeRight},
body_temper = #{bodyTemper},
heart_beat = #{heartBeat},
blood_pressure = #{bloodPressure},
blood_glucose = #{bloodGlucose},
blood_fat = #{bloodFat},
body_detail = #{bodyDetail},
patient_phone = #{patientPhone},
patient_address = #{patientaddress},
comment = #{comment},
where patient_id = #{patientId}
